title: Brad Pitt's F1 Movie Gets a Sequel
summary: A new movie is being made as a follow-up to the hit film F1 starring Brad Pitt. The producer Jerry Bruckheimer told the BBC that they are working on a sequel. The first movie was very popular, making a lot of money and getting nominated for four Oscars, including best picture. Brad Pitt plays a race car driver who comes back to Formula 1 after a long time. The movie was filmed at real races like the British Grand Prix. People have been talking about a sequel for months, and now it's confirmed. The producer didn't say when it will come out or if Brad Pitt will be in it again, but he will help choose the actors. Jerry Bruckheimer is happy about the movie's success and is also working on other films like Heat 2 and more Top Gun movies.
